tool_description: The Where to Credit API provides mileage earning calculations for frequent flyer programs around the world.
name: Where to Credit
title: Where to Credit

api_list.name: /api/1.0/programs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://where-to-credit1.p.rapidapi.com/api/1.0/programs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "where-to-credit1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://where-to-credit1.p.rapidapi.com/api/1.0/programs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "where-to-credit1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

airlines.description: Two-letter IATA carrier codes that are associated with the frequent flyer program.

denomination.description: Name of the unit of a mile or point.

fullName.description: Full name of the frequent flyer program including the airline, if applicable.

id.description: Unique identifier for the frequent flyer program.

programName.description: Name of the frequent flyer program.

tierNames.description: Name of each tier level for the frequent flyer program.
